example[0]: Gilbert was cursing under his breath.
definition[1]: to say or think bad things about someone or something because they have made you angry
example[1]: He cursed his bad luck in arriving just after sheâ€™d left.
example[2]: Elsa cursed herself for believing his lies.
definition[2]: to ask God or a magical power to harm someone
definition[3]: a swear word or words that you say because you are very angry
example[3]: He muttered a curse under his breath.
definition[4]: a word or sentence used to ask God or a magical power to do something bad to someone or something
example[4]: He believed that someone had put a curse on the house.
definition[5]: something that causes trouble, harm etc
example[5]: Noise is one of the curses of modern-day life.
